recipe.title: Sushi Rolls
recipe.description: Fresh homemade sushi with salmon, avocado, and cucumber

steps.descr: Cook sushi rice, mix with rice vinegar while warm
steps.instructions: Cook sushi rice, mix with rice vinegar while warm

on_enter.say: Right, let's get started by cooking the sushi rice. Once it's done, mix it with the rice vinegar while it's still warm. You'll love the aroma!

steps.descr: Let rice cool to room temperature
steps.instructions: Let rice cool to room temperature

on_enter.say: Now, let's let the rice cool down to room temperature. This will take about fifteen minutes. It's important for the perfect texture.
Great! Now place a sheet of nori on your bamboo mat. We're getting closer to the fun part!

steps.descr: Spread rice over nori, leaving 2cm at top
steps.instructions: Spread rice over nori, leaving 2cm at top

on_enter.say: Now, let's spread the rice over the nori, leaving about two centimeters at the top. Use wet hands to prevent sticking.

steps.descr: Add salmon, avocado, cucumber in a line
steps.instructions: Add salmon, avocado, cucumber in a line

on_enter.say: Lovely! Now add the salmon, avocado, and cucumber in a nice line across the rice. This is where the magic happens!
Let's roll it up tightly using the mat. Take your time and enjoy the process. It's all about the technique!

steps.descr: Slice into pieces and serve with condiments
steps.instructions: Slice into pieces and serve with condiments

on_enter.say: Brilliant! Now slice your sushi roll into bite-sized pieces and serve them with soy sauce, wasabi, and pickled ginger. Enjoy your homemade sushi!

notes.text:
Use very fresh, sushi-grade fish
Wet hands when handling rice
Sharp knife is essential for clean cuts
